milestone_breakdown.description: Complete OpenAI API integration with FastAPI backend, including error handling and basic validation
Stripe integration setup, webhook configuration, and comprehensive testing
Ongoing debugging support, data validation improvements, and log analysis tools
End-to-end testing, documentation, and handover preparation

assumptions: Client provides clear API keys and access credentials
Frontend team available for integration testing coordination
Database schema already established or minimal changes needed
OpenAI API use cases are well-defined
Stripe account setup and access provided by client

risk_notes.risk: Vague requirements around 'basic to intermediate' Python skills may indicate scope uncertainty
risk_notes.mitigation: Document assumptions clearly and propose clarifying questions in proposal

risk_notes.risk: Webhook testing dependencies on external services could cause delays
risk_notes.mitigation: Include buffer time in milestone 2 and propose staging environment setup

risk_notes.risk: Part-time availability (20 hrs/week) may require flexible scheduling
risk_notes.mitigation: Emphasize daily Discord sync and clear communication channels

clarifying_questions: What specific OpenAI API endpoints or models need integration?
Is there existing Stripe integration code we should build upon?
What's the current FastAPI backend structure and version?
Are there specific data validation requirements or schemas we should follow?
What's the preferred log analysis tool or format?
